documentation.description: The fields enum API  can be used to discover field names in the index that begin with the provided string. It is designed for low-latency look-ups used in auto-complete scenarios.

index.description: A comma-separated list of index names to search; use `_all` or empty string to perform the operation on all indices

body.description: field name, string which is the prefix expected in matching terms, timeout and size for max number of results
